summary: This bill, the Maintaining and Enhancing Hydroelectricity and River Restoration Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 30% tax credit for investments in existing hydroelectric dams. The credit applies to improvements that increase clean energy production, enhance grid reliability, improve river health and wildlife habitats, and meet safety standards. The bill also allows for elective payment and transfer of the credit and includes conforming amendments to other sections of the tax code, with an effective date of property placed in service after December 31, 2022.
